Mount_Vernon.Isham Park: Isham Park is a 20-acre (81,000 m2) historic park located in the Inwood neighborhood of Manhattan, New York City. The park was created in large part through gifts to the city from the Isham family of land from the William Bradley Isham estate. It sits roughly between Broadway, Isham Street, Seaman Avenue, and West 214th and 215th Street.
